sentences: Ta mäletas kõiki sõpru, kes talle olid aidanud.
Mäletate veel neid aegu, kui me koos käisime?
context: The word 'mäletate' is the second person plural form of the verb 'mäletama', which means to remember or recall something in Estonian. It is commonly used when asking someone if they remember a particular event, person, or thing.
